thread.title: PATRICIA HARDER

author: PATRICIA HARDER
title: PATRICIA HARDER
text: I greatly enjoyed this trip. The tour director was knowledgeable and extremely helpful. The local escorts were funny and knew their islands well. The food was good. The hotels were clean and comfortable. The extra excursions offered a variety of options so all could find something to their liking. My only wish was that the tour spent an extra day on every island but Oahu. So much to see and do. A 15 day trip would have been less hurried.
